snippet.title: Falling Limbs Gameplay Trailer & Demo Release - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch the latest trailer for Falling Limbs, a 2-4 player online and local platform fighter game with graphics inspired by Japanese woodblock print art. Customise your samurai, wield a variety of weaponry and vanquish every rival. Try the new demo now!

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2456820

#convergenceshow #indiegame
